solution.title: We talk business, not paperwork
solution.description: Freelancers, independent workers, micro-businesses: your activity is different, so is our analysis. We look at your reality, not your administrative boxes.

features.title: Variable income accepted
features.description: Your revenue fluctuates? Normal for a freelancer. We analyze your real situation, not a fictional permanent contract.

features.title: No accounts required
features.description: New business? Less than 3 years old? We can still seriously review your application.

features.title: Response in 24-48h
features.description: Time is money. You get an answer in 1-2 days, not 4 weeks.

features.title: Personalized analysis
features.description: No blind algorithm. We look at your sector, your clients, your trajectory.

features.title: Cash flow or investment
features.description: Need breathing room on cash flow? Want to invest in equipment? We adapt to your needs.

features.title: Flexible payments
features.description: Seasonal business? We can adjust your repayment schedule.

features.title: 100% online
features.description: You work from anywhere, so do we. No bank meetings to schedule between clients.

features.title: Coaching included
features.description: Cash flow tracking, budget alerts, advice. We support you beyond the loan.
